messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
After enjoying a meal at the hotel
restaurant, one has a battle.That’s the social etiquette.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Personally, I would much rather pamper
Pokémon than make them battle.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I only seem to run into you after
I go to the restaurant.Etiquette calls for a battle after a
meal. Shall we?
